commit.message:
Change code alignment

Abbreviated output from TestCRC32 on an EC2 c7g instance. The optimization
shows 47 - 99% improvement when the input is at least 256 bytes.

Baseline:

Separate code paths

Abbreviated output from TestCRC32 on an EC2 c7g instance. The optimization
